properties.body:
Hi, this is the Logcomex's Whatsapp!
What you want to talk about?

1 - I am already a customer, want to talk to my Guardian or the Support team
2 - Know our products
3 - I want to be a Logger
4 - I want to be a supplier
Thank you for contacting Logcomex! To talk to us again, just send us a message.
I don’t understand, can you type again?!

To be a part of our *#dreamteam*, just go to our site https://logcomex.gupy.io/, sign up on the platform and see which job you’re interested in.

In case you do not find any position with your profile, no problem, you can leave your data in our database!
This is not the best channel to talk about this, but send your request to the email: compras@logcomex.com.
I don’t understand, can you type again?!
Can you tell me your e-mail address registered in the platform?

What do you want to talk about?

1 - Talk to a Guardian Logger about your Company or subscription?
2 - Talk to a Support Logger?
3 - Talk to a Logger about financial matters.
4 - Talk about contract renewal
5 - Hire new functionality/plan
I don’t understand, can you type again?!

Tell me what is your company profile

1 - I am a Cargo Agent
2 - I am a Port, Terminal or Warehouse
3 - I am an Importer or Exporter
4 - I am a Customs Broker or Freight Forwarder.

Cool! And what information do you need to search with our solutions?

1 - Identify new sales opportunities and elaborate personalized proposals in a faster and more assertive manner
2 - Discover new business opportunities and market trends, through segmented analysis by products
3 - Have a complete and automated management of your processes integrated with your customers and logistics providers.

Cool! And what information do you need to search with our solutions?

1 - Identify new sales opportunities and elaborate personalized proposals in a faster and more assertive way?
2 - Discover new business opportunities and market trends, through segmented analysis by products?
3 - Have a complete and automated management of your processes integrated with your customers and logistics providers?
4 - Improve your operational and sales process efficiency and reduce your automation costs?
5 - Discover new potential leads for your business, automate your process and capture new shipments.

Cool! And what information do you need to look for with our solutions?

1 - Reduce import costs through increased bargaining power
2 - Make a complete and assertive analysis about your market, products, trends and potential customers.

Cool! And what information do you need to look for with our solutions?

1 - Have the complete and automated management of your processes integrated your customers and logistics providers.
I don’t understand, can you type again?!
I don’t understand, can you type again?!
I don’t understand, can you type again?!
I don’t understand, can you type again?!

We can definitely help you with this!

To continue, could you tell us your name?
Now tell us the CNPJ of your company.
Thanks for confirming the data, I'm already transferring you to one of our Loggers!
Wait a moment while I find a Logger available to serve you!

Sorry, I couldn't find your registration. But don't worry, I'll transfer you to an available Logger. 

Could you confirm your name for me?
Oops, it looks like the CNPJ entered is not valid.
Could you provide the name of the company?

At the moment we do not have any agent available to assist you.
Our opening hours are from Monday to Friday from 8 am to 6 pm
Please feel free to contact us via e-mail through the addresses:
guardioes@logcomex.com
suporte@logcomex.com

We saw that you are using a different number than the registered one.
Do you want to update to *{{trigger.message.ChannelAttributes.from | replace:'whatsapp:', ''}}*?

1 - Yes
2 - No

Hello, this is the LogComex Whatsapp for customers!

Let's identify your registration to better serve you!

If you aren't a customer, access our website and request a demo, it's very quick!

https://www.logcomex.com/
Wait a moment while I find a Logger available to serve you!

variables.value: {% case widgets.main_menu_client.inbound.Body %}{% when "1"%}1 - Falar com um Logger Guardião sobre a sua Empresa ou assinatura{% when "2"%}2 - Falar com um Logger de Suporte{% when "3"%}3 - Falar com um Logger sobre assuntos financeiros{% when "4"%}4 - Tratar renovação de contrato{% when "5"%}5 - Contratar nova funcionalidade/plano{% else %}Cliente não identificado no Hubspot{% endcase %}
